title: 07/16/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 07/16/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to some BIG news out of the NBA: Trail Blazers G Damian Lillard is expected to request a trade in the next few days. He lays out the best options for Lillard to end up with and which rumored teams have the best and worst chances to acquire the 6-time All Star. He also explains why the rest of the NFL should be concerned about the Buccaneers this season as they look to win back to back Super Bowls. Plus, 2-time NBA Champion Mario Chalmers joins the show to tell Colin which team is best suited to close out the NBA Finals.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
